recipe_name: Grilled Macadamia-Crusted Tuna with Papaya Salsa
ingredients: 2 cups diced papaya,   +   1/2  red onion, diced, 1  red bell pepper, diced,   +   1/4 cup chopped fresh cilantro, 2 tablespoons lime juice, 1 clove garlic, minced,   +   1/4 teaspoon hot chile paste, or to taste, 4 (6 ounce) tuna steaks,   +   1/4 cup extra-virgin olive oil,   salt and pepper to taste, 3  eggs,   +   1/2 cup chopped macadamia nuts
nutrition: Total Fat 32g 42%, Saturated Fat 6g 29%, Cholesterol 219mg 73%, Sodium 124mg 5%, Total Carbohydrate 14g 5%, Dietary Fiber 4g 13%, Total Sugars 7g, Protein 45g, Vitamin C 87mg 436%, Calcium 110mg 8%, Iron 4mg 21%, Potassium 1096mg 23%
